pullRequest.title: Display network name for IP in shared networks
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
In the list publicipaddress api call ,display the network
name if ip is associated to shared network. The network
name is displayed as of now only if Ip is associated with
isolated network





Types of changes


 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 Enhancement (improves an existing feature and functionality)
 Cleanup (Code refactoring and cleanup, that may add test cases)

Screenshots (if appropriate):
How Has This Been Tested?
Before the patch
(local) 🐵 > list publicipaddresses ipaddress=10.1.1.1 listall=true forvirtualnetwork=false
{
  "count": 1,
  "publicipaddress": [
    {
      "domain": "ROOT",
      "fordisplay": true,
      "forvirtualnetwork": false,
      "id": "eb38235f-e478-476a-bccd-bd4c95d92c8c",
      "ipaddress": "10.1.1.1",
      "isportable": false,
      "issourcenat": false,
      "isstaticnat": false,
      "issystem": false,
      "networkid": "791432-089-4bac-8a12-0c1efb",
      "state": "Allocated",
    }
  ]
}

After the patch
(local) 🐵 > list publicipaddresses ipaddress=10.1.1.1 listall=true forvirtualnetwork=false
{
  "count": 1,
  "publicipaddress": [
    {
      "domain": "ROOT",
      "fordisplay": true,
      "forvirtualnetwork": false,
      "id": "eb38235f-e478-476a-bccd-bd4c95d92c8c",
      "ipaddress": "10.1.1.1",
      "isportable": false,
      "issourcenat": false,
      "isstaticnat": false,
      "issystem": false,
      "networkid": "7932-089-4bac-8a12-0c1eb",
      "networkname": "shared-network",            <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
      "state": "Allocated",
    }
  ]
}

<!-- Please read the [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/apache/cloudstack/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) document -->

nodes.bodyText: @ravening can you change that to use ApiConstants?

commit.message:
Display network name for IP in shared networks

In the list publicipaddress api call ,display the network
name if ip is associated to shared network
